metadata.description: Building intelligent systems that solve real problems, not just implement algorithms.

hero.name: Duran Gezer
hero.title: AI Engineer in Training
hero.subtitle: Building intelligent systems that solve real problems, not just implement algorithms.

about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: From Computer Engineering to Computational Intelligence
about.bio: I'm a 4th-year Computer Engineering student specializing in artificial intelligence. I don't just train models - I architect solutions.

projects.title: Production-Focused Projects
projects.description: ML systems that solve real-world problems

thinking.title: System Thinker
thinking.description: I understand the trade-offs between accuracy, speed, and cost

learning.title: Continuous Learner
learning.description: Keeping up with the latest in AI/ML

about.quote: The best model is the one that works in production.

projects.title: Real Problems, Real Solutions
projects.subtitle: Every project here solved a problem that mattered. Not tutorials—production systems with measurable impact.

sentiment.title: Social Media Sentiment Analysis Engine
sentiment.tagline: Real-time emotion detection system analyzing social media posts with 87% accuracy using transformer-based NLP.
sentiment.impact: Reduced analysis time from hours to seconds, enabling real-time brand monitoring for 50+ clients.

maintenance.title: Predictive Maintenance System
maintenance.tagline: ML-powered system predicting equipment failures 72 hours in advance with 92% precision for manufacturing plants.
maintenance.impact: Prevented $2M in equipment damage and reduced unplanned downtime by 65% across 3 facilities.

codeReview.title: Code Review Assistant
codeReview.tagline: AI-powered tool that understands context and suggests architectural improvements, not just syntax fixes.
codeReview.impact: Reduced code review time by 40% and caught 3x more potential bugs before production.

warehouse.title: Warehouse Vision System
warehouse.tagline: Computer vision system for automated inventory tracking using YOLO v8 with 95% detection accuracy.
warehouse.impact: Eliminated manual counting errors and reduced inventory audit time from 8 hours to 20 minutes.

skills.title: Skills & Technologies
skills.subtitle: Not just buzzwords. Tools I've used to ship real projects.

experience.title: Experience & Education
experience.subtitle: The path that shaped my engineering mindset.

degree.title: B.S. Computer Engineering
degree.description: Focus on Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning. GPA: 3.7/4.0

intern.description: Built ML pipelines and deployed models to production

thinking.title: How I Think About Problems
thinking.subtitle: Principles that guide every decision I make when building systems.
thinking.quote: The best code is the code you don't have to write.

firstPrinciples.title: First Principles, Not Patterns
firstPrinciples.description: I break problems down to fundamentals and build up from there.

outcome.title: Outcome Over Output
outcome.description: Code is a tool, not the goal. Simpler is better.

iterations.title: Fast Iterations Beat Perfect Plans
iterations.description: Build MVPs fast, test early, iterate with real feedback.

systems.title: Systems Thinking
systems.description: Think in graphs, not lists. Understand dependencies.

debugging.title: Debugging Is Teaching
debugging.description: Every bug is a lesson about patterns and pitfalls.

curiosity.title: Curiosity as a Skill
curiosity.description: Explore edge cases, read source code, ask 'what if?'

roadmap.title: The Next 2 Years
roadmap.subtitle: Not a rigid plan. A direction with checkpoints.
roadmap.bottomNote: Progress > plan. I adapt based on what I learn.

now.title: Building Production-Ready Skills
goals: Complete 4 real-world AI projects with measurable impact
Master MLOps: Docker, CI/CD, model versioning
Build this portfolio as a living system

6months.title: Junior AI Engineer Role
goals: Join a team building ML systems at scale
Ship features that impact thousands of users

aiAssistant.title: Ask My AI Assistant
aiAssistant.subtitle: I'm building an AI that knows me better than my résumé does. Ask it anything about my work, thinking, or approach to problems.
aiAssistant.sampleQuestionsTitle: Sample questions you'll be able to ask:

sampleQuestions.q1: What projects are you most proud of?
sampleQuestions.q2: How do you approach learning new technologies?
sampleQuestions.q3: What's your take on the future of AI?
sampleQuestions.q4: Walk me through your engineering process

aiAssistant.inDevelopmentDesc: Training on my projects, writing samples, and engineering philosophy

realtime.title: Real-time Responses
realtime.desc: Instant answers about my projects and experience

context.title: Context-Aware
context.desc: Understands follow-up questions and maintains conversation flow

learning.title: Always Learning
learning.desc: Updates as I complete new projects and gain experience
